name: Kim Min-jun
title: Lead Food Guide
bio: Born and raised in Seoul, Min-jun has spent over 8 years sharing his passion for Korean cuisine with travelers from around the world. His grandmother's recipes inspire every tour.

name: Park Soo-yeon
title: Culinary Expert
bio: A trained chef turned tour guide, Soo-yeon brings deep culinary knowledge to every market tour. She's famous for finding the best hidden gems in Gwangjang Market.

name: Lee Joon-ho
title: Street Food Specialist
bio: Joon-ho knows every street food vendor in Myeongdong by name. His energetic personality and love for spicy food make every tour an adventure.

name: Choi Yuna
title: Cultural Food Guide
bio: With a background in Korean history, Yuna connects every dish to its cultural origins. Her tours are as educational as they are delicious.
